title: Battle of Britain
creator_credit: United Artists Corporation, Harry Saltzman, S Benjamin Fisz Productions and Guy Hamilton
brief_description: This film recreates the greatest air battle in history, when the outnumbered British Royal Airforce battled and fought off the powerful German Luftwaffe at the beginning of World War II. For this film more than 100 vintage aircraft were assembled to re-enact the historic battle in the skies over England. Stars Michael Caine, Trevor Howard, Curt Jurgens, Kenneth More, Ralph Richardson.
